4.6. manager.qwidgetComponent¶

qwidgetComponent.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Defines the QWidgetComponent class.

Others:

4.6.1. Module Attributes¶

manager.qwidgetComponent.LOGGER¶

4.6.2. Functions¶

manager.qwidgetComponent.QWidgetComponentFactory(uiFile=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Defines a class factory creating QWidgetComponent classes using given ui file.

Parameters:
  • uiFile (unicode) – Ui file.
  • *args (*) – Arguments.
  • **kwargs (**) – Keywords arguments.
Returns:

QWidgetComponent class.
Return type:

QWidgetComponent
